pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, March 4, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Greater Toronto Area, Ontario

Private meetings

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will make a transit announcement and hold a media availability. Minister of Transport Omar Alghabra, Ontario’s Associate Minister of Transport (GTA) Stan Cho, and Mayor of Mississauga Bonnie Crombie will also be in attendance.

Mississauga Transit storage facility
975 Central Parkway West
Mississauga, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event are asked to arrive no later than 10:30 a.m.
  • Media may use the employee parking lot and enter via the door off Erindale Station Road.

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and the Minister of Transport Omar Alghabra will meet with members of the Muslim community.

Closed to media

5:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with members of the Ukrainian community.

Media can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
